title.title: BALI ATV AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.text: BALI ATV AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.html: BALI ATV AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR

tagline.title: BALI ATV AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR IS COMBO ACTIVITIES FOR RIDE AND ATV BIKE FOR 2 HOURS AND THEN CONTINUE RIDING AND ELEPHANT WITH DURATION 30 MINUTES RIDE
tagline.text: BALI ATV AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR IS COMBO ACTIVITIES FOR RIDE AND ATV BIKE FOR 2 HOURS AND THEN CONTINUE RIDING AND ELEPHANT WITH DURATION 30 MINUTES RIDE
tagline.html: BALI ATV AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR IS COMBO ACTIVITIES FOR RIDE AND ATV BIKE FOR 2 HOURS AND THEN CONTINUE RIDING AND ELEPHANT WITH DURATION 30 MINUTES RIDE

description.text: Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour is Bali Double Activities Tour is great combination for riding 2 different exictement such as riding an atv bike for 2 hours through jungle, local village and river, then continue the tour for riding an elephant through jungle and local village. Is perfect choice for those looking different experience while holiday in Bali by allowed you explore beauty of Bali by ride an ATV Bike and then riding the biggest animal elephant for 30 minutes ride through forest and local village. The first adventure begins by riding the ATV bike along the tracks provided at ATV company for 2 hours, as for the tracks that will pass through the forest with beautiful natural scenery, along the local village and small river, this track will make your adventure more memorable where You will be guided by a professional ATV guide who will always provide the best service for you, after completing the ride at the ride you will enjoy a buffet lunch at the ATV company, finish the adventure lunch then continue to elephant park to ride the elephant for 30 minutes along the forest and local village and guided by a professional elephant guide. After the elephant ride, we will head to your hotel to stay by bringing a very impressive experience on the combination of the Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour

title.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali ATV Ride Tour | Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali ATV Ride Tour Packages is a Journey to explore the hidden beauty of Bali Islands by riding ATV Bike and assist by professional Bali ATV Ride tour. The journey will explore the beauty of the rice field and see the amazing view of the rice, you can stop here for take picture as much as you want and then continue to passed the local village and see the social activities life at the village. Is great experience vy explore Bali islands in the way you never try before. Try the beat the beatean track we offer during this trip and this is not a speeding tour, it just only sightseeing tour by riding an ATV bike.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. The elephant parks we will visit is the Bakas Elephant Park in Klungkung regency, in here you will riding an elephant and will assist by professional Elephant Tour Guide. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.

price.title: Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour Price :

  • 1 person : IDR 1,650,000 (solo traveler)
  • 2 person : IDR 1,375,000/person
  • 3 person : IDR 1,300,000/person
  • 4 person : IDR 1,250,000/person
  • 5 person or More : IDR 1,200,000/person

Remarks :

  • Get Special price group booking

Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • 2 Hours ATV Ride Adventure
  • Elephant Ride at Bakas Elephant Park
  • Professional ATV and Elephant Ride Guide
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Mineral Water
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali ATV and Elephant Ride Tour Itinerary :

content.event: ATV Ride Finish and enjoy lunch
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Elephant Ride finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
